title: Puzzle Slider

desc: An app that allows a user to enter a 5 digit zip code and using an API, pull in real time weather data for that location.

title: Laravel Library
desc: My first use of Laravel.  This is a library that will let card holders checkout books and as a librarian you can keep patrons in line.  Register for an account or sign in as a librarian.  UN: admin@admin.com  PW: adminpass
